transcript: okay what's something that can compound forever that has a huge Tam and I said Layla if I were to die tomorrow what business would you start and she was like I would start a recruiting firm is there a way that we could combine what you like and what I like into something cool for us like the most Hands-On valuable thing that you can do for a business is find a players our competitive mode is that we have more influence we have tons of people every single day that are applying for portfolio positions and then we can screen them vet them and then because we know the company and because we're long-term incentivized we don't just want to like put a body in a seat we want to fill it with somebody who matches the culture and matches the skill set of the business at this level
